amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE IX ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 901. None of the funds made available in this Act to the Small Business Administration may be used for the Grace Johnstown Area Regional Industries Incubator and Workforce Development program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds for the Grace Johnstown Area Regional Industries Incubator and Workforce Development program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 335 (Roll no. 590).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 335 (Roll no. 590).
